ya2.2.3:6.1: ⇒ Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjati tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhatīti?

ya2.2.3:146.1: Asaññasattaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjati.
ya2.2.3:146.2: Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjati.
ya2.2.3:147.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:148.1: Catuvokārā pañcavokārā cavantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjati, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:148.2: Parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjati saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:149.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjatīti?
ya2.2.3:152.1: ⇒ Yassa rūpakkhandho uppajjittha tassa vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:153.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:153.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:154.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:155.1: ⇒ Yassa vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:156.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:156.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:157.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:161.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:162.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:162.2: Itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:163.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:164.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:164.2: Itaresaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:165.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:166.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:166.2: Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:167.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:168.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:168.2: Itaresaṃ catuvokārānaṃ pañcavokārānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca uppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:170.1: ⇒ Yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:171.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:172.1: ⇒ Yassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:173.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:177.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:178.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ arūpānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:178.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:179.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:180.1: Pañcavokāre parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:180.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ arūpe parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati rūpakkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:181.1: ⇒ Yassa yattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha tassa tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissatīti?
ya2.2.3:182.1: Suddhāvāsaṃ upapajjantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:182.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati.
ya2.2.3:183.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati tassa tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthāti?
ya2.2.3:184.1: Parinibbantānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho na nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ tattha vedanākkhandho nuppajjittha.
ya2.2.3:184.2: Suddhāvāse parinibbantānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ tattha saññākkhandho ca na nirujjhissati vedanākkhandho ca nuppajjittha.
